comments: Alex is amazing and really cares about his students' learning experience! I learned so much and had a paper I was really proud of by the end. If he teaches it again, definitely take it!
Great, engaging material and very relevant stuff.
This course is well-organized and covers very interesting material.  Alex did a great job putting together the readings and class discussions.

This is a great seminar to take to learn a good deal about business power in American public policy. Alex is a great preceptor and is very invested in this course; he was also very approachable and helpful with all assignments. Be prepared to come to class to discuss the reading in depth, but all of the material in the course is very manageable.
The topic of this course was very interesting and timely. It was really engaging and I definitely recommend it. Alex is a great section leader.
